name: Mind Garden
description:
Take care of your mind garden and ensure that it doesn't go out of control. 

***Make sure you play it at 1920 by 1080 resolution or higher, unfortunately some of the UI may get cropped otherwise. The patch is done and will be released soon***

_________________________________________

A project created by Kotiya (Atiya Nova and Kodey Owen) for the GMTK 2020 Jam. 

All the code was written by Atiya. The art was done by Kodey.

The background music is free, it's called Far out there by Sergey Cheremisinov. The rest of the sounds are foley, recorded on an iPhone.
